channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Stuffed animals and nude photos: What secrets did Epstein’s Paris home hide?
Is India eyeing the Iron Beam as Modi visits Israel?
Why Israel’s ‘hexagon of alliances’ with India has spooked Pakistan
How did 72 tigers die in 2 weeks in a Thai tourist park?
Defence, tech, trade: What’s the agenda of PM Modi’s Israel visit?
Nearly 5,000 sailors, malfunctioning toilets: What’s happening on US’ largest warship amid Iran tensions?
A new regional flashpoint: How Pakistan-Afghanistan tensions threaten South Asian stability
item.description: New Delhi must balance its desire to maintain stability in Kabul with its scepticism of the Taliban regime, while avoiding direct entanglement in the worsening Pakistan-Afghanistan rift

item.title: Trump’s Iran calculus: Is regime change the endgame?
item.description: The fact that the US is moving massive military forces and has not pulled back suggests a readiness for action rather than mere deterrence

item.title: Waiting for the hammer: Iran’s regime on the brink as Trump holds the final nail
item.description: History shows us that all brutal regimes have expiry dates. The mullahs' is here

item.title: How PM Modi’s Israel visit is crucial amid escalating West Asian tensions
item.description: PM Narendra Modi’s upcoming visit to Israel is strategically significant, as it comes at a time of heightened volatility in West Asia, with the serious threat of a US/Israel conflict with Iran looming. India’s longstanding ties with Israel and other regional powers could play a crucial role in reducing tensions

item.title: Why Hormuz, not Fordow, is the real centre of gravity in the Iran crisis
item.description: The central policy variable in the confrontation is not the technical status of Iran’s nuclear programme but the stability of a critical global chokepoint

item.title: How access to critical minerals will determine the new world order
item.description: In the era of backward integration with natural resources, the focus has shifted to securing supplies of critical minerals and rare earth elements, as they are key ingredients for modern technology, the global energy transition, national defence, and taking the lead in the space era
